title: I WANT SOMBRERO

embed.description: Overwatchâ„¢ is a team-based shooter where heroes do battle in a world of conflict.

body: THE WORLD COULD ALWAYS USE MORE HEROES

replies.body: Okay but if the world could use more heroes, but heroes never die...then is the whole world just heroes?
There can't be a hero without a villain or crisis. If there weren't heroes, we'd be living in Utopia.
